ygData.subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] It's all set!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay all, I have set it up.  Go to the link below and join if you want to be part of this new group :-)  Tonight, I will sign on and create a character (had
ygData.messageBody:
Okay all, I have set it up. Go to the link below and join if you want
to be part of this new group :-) Tonight, I will sign on and create a
character (had other things going on last night). At some point (maybe
this weekend?) we can get the people needed to create a guild and get
that done... Though, for now, if you are interested in being a part of
this, why don't we move discussion to the new group, as to not peeve off
people on this list that aren't interested *laughs*



Group name: Tavernites

Group home page: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Tavernites





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
